description:
The Superfeet Winter Support Insoles are insoles that are designed to provide stability, support and cushioning for your feet during winter sports, such as skiing and snowboarding. They are made to replace the removable insole in your ski boots, snowboard boots and other winter-specific footwear.

  • They have a deep heel cup that cradles your feet inside your boots, a Superfeet shape that helps stabilize your foot, and a durable construction that keeps its shape with every turn
  • They also have a moisture-wicking top cover that helps reduce odors and keep your boots fresh, a thermal top cover that adds warmth in cold temperatures, and an Evolyte carbon fiber stabilizer cap that responds to compression
name: Superfeet Winter Support Insoles - Unisex
